metadataOrigin.when: "Identifier(s) of the text(s) on the conglomerate artefact

change.who: part: if there is more than one text on the conglomerate artefact
part:"Identifier(s) of the artefact(s) that pertains to the conglomerate artefact
part: if there is more than one artefact

resourceManagement.project: Identifier of the monument that pertains to the conglomerate artefact

compositeArtefactDescription.compositeArtefactID: write ""yes"" if you're encoding a case of reuse"

material.class: Number of plates observed within the set

compositeArtefactDescription.material: Number of plates observed within the set

decoDesc.p: Number of plates estimated (but not observed)

compositeArtefactFormat.depth: Indicate the presence of seal(s) by yes or no

copperplateFormat.bindingInfo: Description of what is known or recorded about the origin and subsequent history of the artefact (free text)
copperplateFormat.foliationInfo: Remarks on conglomerate artefact-related metadata (free text)
copperplateFormat.sealingTechnique: Place where the artefact was originally exposed — don't fill in if place ID is already available
copperplateFormat.sealHeight: ID of the place where the artefact was originally exposed
copperplateFormat.sealWidth: Place where the artefact was discovered — don't fill in if place ID is already available

compositeArtefactHistory.origDate: Coordinates if you have a specific topographic data

originExhibPlace.id: Collection or place (if the artefact remains in situ) where the artefact is currently preserved — don't fill in if collection ID is already available

originExhib.originExhibPlace: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

discoveryPlace.discoveryPlaceId: ID of the collection (institution or private collection) or place of preservation ID (if the artefact remains in situ)

discoveryEvents.type: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)
date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationPlaceId.id: Institution or private person authorizing access to the artefact

preservationPlace.preservationPlaceId: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationEvents.type: Identifier(s) of the related surrogate(s). Use $ to separate the identifiers.
preservationEvents.when: Identifier(s) of the related digital image(s). Use $ to separate the identifiers.

preservationEvents.type: Link(s) to related images stored on external repository. Use $ to separate the identifiers.

textID.idno: Iconography and/or decoration observed on the artefact (free text)

remarks.p: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)
